reasoning: The unrestrained, numerous stab wounds point to a crime of passion rather than a controlled, planned attack.
The presence of sexual assault elements with chaotic violence supports an impulsive approach.
The aftermath shows no deliberate manipulation of the scene to stage a trophy or message.
